item.title: Lazada User Interface Causes Disappointment and Resentment to Buyers.
item.description: First week of August, I bought a Raspberry Pi in Lazada. Since it needs a keyboard and mouse and I don’t have one, I searched and bought as well. I selected one that’s unbranded and cheap since this is only for a hobby. I can always upgrade later if needed. Below was the item I thought I was buying and getting: Fast forward to delivery day of the supposed keyboard and mouse, I only received one item: “mouse only”.
